Swarogya
//Google ca-app-pub-9621715580326439~3511568747 ca-app-pub-9621715580326439/3647300111
Select Cancel Emergency Type Home Scan Register Profile Update Choose Proceed Accept Continue as currentPatientId professionalId professionalHospitalName professionalName No prescribed medicines Send Alert No report tasks assigned "Medical records last update: %1$s"
"It is our responsibility to support each other in this war against coronavirus. An efficient management system is the only thing that can help us curb this. So let us all play our part in this battle!

Register to your respective hospital. After that you will get insights to your treatment details and timely notifications with updates.

Once done with that, you will get timely notifications and can easily keep a track of your health conditions and get assistance whenever you need to." Medical Records BP-High in mmHg BP-Low in mmHg Oxygen-Level Pulse per minute Temperature in Fahrenheit Register to a Hospital Name of the Contact Second Emergency Contact Number First Emergency Contact Number Email Residential Address Full Name Blood Group Date of Birth Selfie Gender Registration Documents Images Selected Image Please wait.

This might take long. Do not close or perform anything!
Please add all the necessary documents as requested by the Hospital according to their needs like an identity proof, test reports, etc.

Click on Add document, put a name to it and add all the pages to it. Finally, once you have added all the documents, you will get an option to scan the barcode as provided by the staff.

We advice you to proceed only after showing the staff member the documents that you have added here. Click on Add Image to take an image of the document one by one.
Every side of a page is clicked, counting it as a single image.

After you are done, click on Done to redirect back to the documents page.
You can add more documents by again clicking on the add document button there.

Hold an image to delete once you add. Add Medical Records Add Document Add Documents Add Image Set Name Done Yes No Update Medicines Update the records database of the selected patient by clicking on Add Document to set a name to it and open a page where you can add the corresponding images to it.

Please make sure that you keep your app on after clicking proceed because it will update in the background.

Hold on any document made to get the option to delete it in case added. Medicines General Details Assistance Covid-19 UPDATES Start maintaining your medical records! Swarogya has been made and managed by Indians. It secures your data preciously and helps you get recovered from your ailment in the best way possible!

This has been developed by
Akshat Tiwari and Kuhoo Tiwari. Update the patient medicines? Thank you for your service! Scan Patient Patients Home care currentSlot Home Care Once you are registered to more than one treatments, you can smoothly select the desired session and get updated efficiently. Health Management lastDate
